mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher (teacher_id, real_name, gender, department, phone, position, email, user_id) VALUES (#{teacherNumber}, #{realName}, #{gender}, #{department}, #{phone}, #{position}, #{email}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher SET teacher_id = #{teacherNumber}, real_name = #{realName}, gender = #{gender}, department = #{department}, phone = #{phone}, position = #{position}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.teacher_id, t.real_name, t.gender, t.department, t.position, t.phone, t.email, t.user_id FROM teacher t WHERE t.teacher_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR t.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
